domain.systems

Class Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.systems.Score

  • public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
    This keeps track of the score that the player achieves throughout the game. The score depends on how many (and of which) fragments are destroyed.
    See Also:
    Laser, Net, Control, SystemsController, Wave

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int LARGE_FRAGMENT_POINTS
      How many points a large fragment adds to the score.
      private static int MEDIUM_FRAGMENT_POINTS
      How many points a medium fragment adds to the score.
      private static int score
      The current score of this play-through.
      private static int SMALL_FRAGMENT_POINTS
      How many points a small fragment adds to the score.

    • Method Detail

      • updateScore

        static void updateScore(int fragmentIdentifier)
        Update the score. The score will be updated according to the fragmentIdentifier:
        1 : Small fragment
        2 : Medium fragment
        3 : Large fragment
        Parameters:
        fragmentIdentifier - A value between 1-3. (Depending on the identifier)
